name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: CONCAT_WS('',case when (t1.size/1024) > 1024 then ROUND(t1.size/(1024 * 1024), 1) when (t1.size/1024) > 1 then ROUND(t1.size/1024, 1) else ROUND(t1.size, 1) end, case when (t1.size/1024) > 1024 then 'MB' when (t1.size/1024) > 1 then 'KB' else 'B' end)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: STRSIZE

queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`ADDEDBY`,
t1.`ADDEDDATE`,
t1.`DELETED`,
t1.`DEPT`,
t1.`DEPTNAME`,
t1.`DOWNLOADS`,
t1.`EXTENSION`,
t1.`EXTRA`,
t1.`FILESN`,
t1.`ID`,
t1.`OBJECTID`,
t1.`OBJECTTYPE`,
t1.`ORG`,
t1.`ORGNAME`,
t1.`PATHNAME`,
t1.`SIZE`,
CONCAT_WS('',case when (t1.size/1024) > 1024 then ROUND(t1.size/(1024 * 1024), 1) when (t1.size/1024) > 1 then ROUND(t1.size/1024, 1) else ROUND(t1.size, 1) end, case when (t1.size/1024) > 1024 then 'MB' when (t1.size/1024) > 1 then 'KB' else 'B' end) AS `STRSIZE`,
t1.`TITLE`,
t1.`UPDATEBY`
FROM `zt_file` t1
